observation_location.full: ERC, Clarkson Campus, Potsdam, New York

current_observation.observation_time: Last Updated on April 2, 10:48 AM EDT
current_observation.wind_string: From the SW at 9.0 MPH Gusting to 12.0 MPH

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 52F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
